metadata.name: Magic Items (Egyptian Expansion)
metadata.description: Magical artifacts inspired by Egyptian mythology and culture

afterlife_objects.text: Scarab amulet that can temporarily resurrect the recently deceased for conversation
Scale that weighs intentions rather than physical objects
Papyrus scroll that records the true deeds of a person's life, regardless of reputation
Ankh that transfers life force between two beings when held between them
Canopic jar that preserves not organs but cherished memories

divine_instruments.text: Scepter that controls the movement of sand, creating or dispersing dunes
Sistrum that, when shaken, causes plants to grow rapidly in barren soil
Crook that can guide and control the minds of animals
Flail that harvests truth instead of grain when swung
Headpiece that allows the wearer to perceive through the eyes of birds

protective_talismans.text: Eye of Horus pendant that makes the wearer invisible to those with harmful intent
Woven reed bracelet that absorbs poison from food or drink
Lotus flower carving that purifies water and reveals hidden currents
Cobra figurine that comes alive to defend its owner when danger approaches
Knot amulet that untangles any problem when held in meditation

transformation_artifacts.text: Mask that transforms the wearer into the animal it depicts during moonlight
Oil that, when applied, allows the user to become living stone until sunrise
Headdress that grants the wisdom of ancestors when worn during important decisions
Sandals that allow walking on any surface, including water and air
Kohl that, when applied to the eyes, reveals the true form of shapeshifters

creation_tools.text: Chisel that can carve life-like statues that animate under specific conditions
Brush that paints scenes that become reality at the next dawn
Clay that forms itself into whatever the holder needs most
Loom that weaves cloth depicting future events
Potter's wheel that creates vessels that fill with whatever the creator desires

river_magic.text: Reed boat that navigates to the source of any river without guidance
Water clock that controls the flow of time for those who drink from it
Fishing net that catches secrets instead of fish when cast at night
Nilometer that predicts fortunes rather than floods
Amphora that fills with water that heals any ailment but causes temporary amnesia

tomb_treasures.text: Ushabti figurine that comes to life to complete one task before turning to dust
Funerary mask that shows the wearer's face as it will appear in old age
Sarcophagus that preserves anything placed inside in perfect condition
Book of spells that can only be read by candlelight and forgotten by daylight
Mummified cat that guides the owner through the realm of dreams
